DataElement.preferredName: Birth Control Pill Current Use Duration
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A record of a women's use of oral contraceptives, usually hormonal, taken orally in order to block ovulation and prevent the occurrence of pregnancy._Duration (in years) in which the current medication has been used.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A record of a women's use of oral contraceptives, usually hormonal, taken orally in order to block ovulation and prevent the occurrence of pregnancy.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Compounds, usually hormonal, taken orally in order to block ovulation and prevent the occurrence of pregnancy. The hormones are generally estrogen or progesterone or both.

Concepts.definition: An agent taken orally to prevent conception.

Property.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the patient's ability to conceive or nurse offspring and/or their current reproductive status.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Duration (in years) in which the current medication has been used.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A category of organic or inorganic substances, elements, and isotopes used in research or for the prevention, diagnosis, and/or treatment of disease states. Includes biologically active substances that are either synthetically manufactured or endogenous substances extracted and processed to be reintroduced into an organism. Chemicals and drugs also include hazardous substances, and naturally occurring or synthetically produced substances required to maintain life.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.:A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.:put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.:The period of time during which something continues.

Concepts.definition: Occurring in or belonging to the present time.

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.
The period of time during which something continues.
